fcp.description: First Contentful Paint should be under 1.8s

lcp.description: Largest Contentful Paint should be under 2.5s

fid.description: First Input Delay should be under 100ms

cls.description: Cumulative Layout Shift should be under 0.1

ttfb.description: Time to First Byte should be under 600ms

processingTime.description: Image processing should complete within 8 seconds

uploadTime.description: Image upload should complete within 5 seconds

cameraInitTime.description: Camera initialization should complete within 2 seconds
